data.name: Devil May Cry 5 - Pasta Breaker
data.detailed_description:
A Devil Breaker that makes pasta extra easy to eat. Created by Nico for clumsy Nero from Helter Skelter and Punch Line parts. The revolving fork on the end is neat, but it's not particularly useful in battle.

Note: this content is usable from mission 2 onwards. It cannot be used in Bloody Palace.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A Devil Breaker that makes pasta extra easy to eat. Created by Nico for clumsy Nero from Helter Skelter and Punch Line parts. The revolving fork on the end is neat, but it's not particularly useful in battle.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • 处理器: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300, or better
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM, or better
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 存储空间: 需要 35 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: *Xinput support Controllers recommended *Internet connection required for game activation. (Network connectivity uses Steam® developed by Valve® Corporation.)
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • 处理器: Intel® Core™ i7-3770, AMD FX™-9590, or better
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 6GB VRAM, AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 8GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 存储空间: 需要 35 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: *Xinput support Controllers recommended *Internet connection required for game activation. (Network connectivity uses Steam® developed by Valve® Corporation.)

Denuvo Anti-tamper
5 different PC within a day machine activation limit

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong langauge, violence and nudity.
